name: 4x4 Parking
description:
Parking games are great practice for the real thing and you may consider yourself a parking master... but have you ever parked a 4x4?
Cast aside ordinary cars and get behind the wheel of a 4x4 as you attempt to park and guide it through the trickiest situations.

Drive between obstacles and park your 4x4 perfectly in the parking spot to pass a level and increase your skill as a parking game but watch out, one wrong turn and this parking game is over.
